item.title: My Dev Journal (could be yours too)
item.description: If you read tech blogs you’ll come across articles stating how important how important it is to maintain a dev journal or bragging doc or what have you. Basically it’s just a doc where you track all that you have done, read, watched, etc. Your brain being a finite resource can only hold so much information. Over time you lose track of the code change you made, the valuable life advice you gave to that junior, some quote someone said over a meeting.
